title: Serebii.bit - Where Legends Come To Life
description:
Contains up-to-date news, databases and information about all Pokémon Games, TCG sets and the TV show.
[Official profile](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/1ArEx7Ufd1vwBzjB2eJESiZDBA2TkVgYft/serebii@zeroid.bit)

post.title: Welcome!
post.body: This site is based in the Serebii.net from the surface web/clearnet. We plan a multilanguage system. We only support decentralized web apps about Pokémon.
